sentences.en: A perennial is a plant that lives indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 多年生植物是指能存活很多年的植物。

sentences.en: All this has made the bank a perennial takeover target.
sentences.cn: 这也使得渣打银行一年到头都是惹火的收购对象.

sentences.en: All this is intensifying the perennial debate about safety.
sentences.cn: 所有这些都激化着长期以来关于汽车的安全问题的争论.

sentences.en: Description: Perennial herbaceous vines, with milky juice , glabrous throughout.
sentences.cn: 形态特徵: 多年生草质藤本, 全体无毛, 有乳汁.

sentences.en: Eurasian garden perennial having scarlet flowers in dense terminal heads.
sentences.cn: 在茂密的叶柄端部开猩红色花的一种欧亚多年生园林植物.

sentences.en: His brown velvet jacket had become perennial.
sentences.cn: 他那件咖啡色丝绒上装仿佛已经跟他结了不解之缘.

sentences.en: I wonder at her perennial youthfulness.
sentences.cn: 我对她青春常驻感到惊讶.

sentences.en: In terms of stream flow, there are three general types of streams : ephemeral , intermittent, and perennial.
sentences.cn: 根据河川的经流, 河流通常可分为三种类型: 季节性河流 、 间歇性河流和常流河.

sentences.en: Lack of resources has been a perennial problem since the beginning.
sentences.cn: 财力不足从最初起就一直是个问题。

sentences.en: Perennial crop: Crop, which remains on the field more than one year.
sentences.cn: 多年生作物: 在地块上生长一年以上的作物.

sentences.en: Perennial ryegrass throws a lot of autumn growth.
sentences.cn: 多年生黑麦草在秋季长势很好.

sentences.en: Sugar cane is a tropical perennial. It's one of the grasses.
sentences.cn: 甘蔗是一种热带多年生植物,它是一种禾本科植物.

sentences.en: Teddy bears are a perennial favorite with children.
sentences.cn: 泰迪熊一直受到孩子们的喜爱。

sentences.en: The fine carnation of their cheeks is perennial as sunlight in the seventh heavens.
sentences.cn: 她们面颊的美丽的淡红色象七重天里的阳光始终辉煌灿烂.

sentences.en: the perennial problem of water shortage
This perennial favorite is now available in a board book edition.
sentences.cn: 这是一本充满想像力、观察力的绘本,让我们一起来发掘这神秘客真实的身份!

trans.tran_cn: 终年的,四季不断的,持久的
终年的，长久的，多年生的，不断生长的，四季不断的
trans.tran_en: a plant that is perennial lives for more than two years
a plant that lives for more than two years
